FB,Google must face U.S. privacy lawsuit over commingled user dataGoogle must face U.S. privacy lawsuit over commingled user dataFacebook's Zuckerberg to testify at N.Y. forgery trial -prosecutors NEW YORK, July 22 The government will call Mark Zuckerberg to testify against an upstate New York man accused of trying to cheat the billionaire founder of Facebook Inc  out of half his stake in the social media company, a federal prosecutor said on Tuesday.  Facebook's Zuckerberg to testify at N.Y. forgery trial -prosecutors NEW YORK, July 22 The government will call Mark Zuckerberg to testify against an upstate New York man accused of trying to cheat the billionaire founder of Facebook Inc  out of half his stake in the social media company, a federal prosecutor said on Tuesday. A federal judge rejected Google Inc's bid to dismiss a privacy lawsuit claiming it commingled user data across different products and disclosed that data to advertisers without permission.Facebook's Zuckerberg to testify at N.Y. forgery trial -prosecutors NEW YORK, July 22 The government will call Mark Zuckerberg to testify against an upstate New York man accused of trying to cheat the billionaire founder of Facebook Inc  out of half his stake in the social media company, a federal prosecutor said on Tuesday. F,Galhotra succeeds Farley at Ford as head of Lincoln brand DETROIT, July 22 Ford Motor Co has named engineer Kumar Galhotra to succeed Jim Farley as head of the company's Lincoln brand, the automaker said Tuesday. 
GS,Goldman, Warburg Pincus and others nearing $2bln Huarong deal-sourcesUPDATE 2-Goldman, Warburg among investors nearing $2 bln Huarong deal -sourcesGoldman, Warburg among investors nearing $2 billion Huarong deal: sourcesBES says Goldman Sachs taken 2.27 pct interest in bank LISBON, July 22 Banco Espirito Santo (BES), Portugal's largest listed bank, said on Tuesday that U.S. investment bank Goldman Sachs has acquired a 2.27 percent interest in the bank.  BES says Goldman Sachs taken 2.27 pct interest in bank LISBON, July 22 Banco Espirito Santo (BES), Portugal's largest listed bank, said on Tuesday that U.S. investment bank Goldman Sachs has acquired a 2.27 percent interest in the bank. HONG KONG Goldman Sachs and private equity firm Warburg Pincus are among the investors nearing a deal to buy an up to 20 percent stake in China Huarong Asset Management Ltd for about $2 billion, seeking a share in the profitable business of bad loan management in China.BES says Goldman Sachs taken 2.27 pct interest in bank LISBON, July 22 Banco Espirito Santo (BES), Portugal's largest listed bank, said on Tuesday that U.S. investment bank Goldman Sachs has acquired a 2.27 percent interest in the bank. JPM,UK regulator confirms $770,000 fine on ex JPMorgan banker Hannam LONDON, July 22 Britain's financial watchdog on Tuesday confirmed a 450,000 pound ($768,000) fine on high-profile former JPMorgan banker Ian Hannam for market abuse after a long and complex court battle.

MS,Morgan Stanley chief marketing officer leaves after 9 months NEW YORK, July 22 Susan Smith Ellis has left Morgan Stanley nine months after becoming the chief marketing officer of the Wall Street bank, a spokeswoman confirmed on Tuesday. 
NFLX,Netflix profit doubles on U.S., foreign subscriber growthUPDATE 1-Netflix's Europe expansion seen eating into profits July 22 Netflix Inc's planned expansion in Europe will set the video streaming company up for growth, but will increase content and marketing expenses in the near term, analysts said.  UPDATE 1-Netflix's Europe expansion seen eating into profits July 22 Netflix Inc's planned expansion in Europe will set the video streaming company up for growth, but will increase content and marketing expenses in the near term, analysts said. LOS ANGELES Netflix Inc said on Monday its quarterly profit more than doubled, boosted by strong growth in U.S. and international subscribers as a price increase for its most popular U.S. video streaming plan did not deter new users. |UPDATE 1-Netflix's Europe expansion seen eating into profits July 22 Netflix Inc's planned expansion in Europe will set the video streaming company up for growth, but will increase content and marketing expenses in the near term, analysts said. column2: Hundreds of postal workers protest at Chicago Staples over outsourcingHundreds of postal workers protest at Chicago Staples over outsourcing CHICAGO Hundreds of postal workers from around the country protested outside a Staples store in downtown Chicago on Tuesday over a program that allows postal services to be sold at more than 80 Staples retail outlets. column2: U.S. intervenes in whistleblower suit against Symantec Corp WASHINGTON
column3: July 22 The U.S. Justice Department on Tuesday said it has intervened in a whistleblower lawsuit against Symantec Corporation that alleges the company submitted false claims to a government agency it worked with under contract.
